summary: 1950  was a common year starting on Sunday in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1950  was a common year starting on Sunday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1950th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 950th year of the 2nd millennium, the 50th year of the 20th century, and the 1st year of the 1950s decade. It is also the index year, or year 0, that scientists use for Before Present figures.
